name: Grisaia Phantom Trigger Vol.5
description: Murasaki's sister Yuuki has returned to Japan and begins bonding with the other members of Class A. Feeling out of place, Murasaki thinks back on when she first met Haruto. Where was the secret art Haruto sought out in her village really hidden?
minimum_requirements: OS: 7/8.1/10 Processor: Intel Core 2 DUO Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: VRAM320MB, 1280×720 DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 3 GB available space Sound Card: Support for PCM playback through DirectSound Additional Notes: Windows Media Player 9 equivalent or higher
recommended_requirements: OS: 7/8.1/10 Processor: Intel Core 2 DUO 2.66GHz Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: VRAM512MB, 1280×720 Storage: 3 GB available space Sound Card: Support for PCM playback through DirectSound Additional Notes: Windows Media Player 9 equivalent or higher
